channel.title: Clang-Tidy on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Clang-Tidy on DevOps Engineer

item.title: cpp-linter-action—Latest Version Now Supports Pull Request Review Functionality 👏
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the new feature of cpp-linter-action Pull Request Review, allowing developers to directly submit code modification suggestions on GitHub, improving code quality and collaboration efficiency.

item.title: C/C++ Code Formatting and Static Analysis—A One-Stop Workflow with Cpp Linter
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces tools and workflows for C/C++ code formatting and static analysis, focusing on the use and integration of clang-tools.
